Class Label

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idibon.api.model.Label

  • public class Label
extends Object
    A label (classification / type of data) inside a Task.

        public List<? extends TuningRules.Rule> getRules()

        Throws:
        IOException

      • createRule

        public TuningRules.Rule createRule(String phrase,
                                   double weight)
        Creates a new tuning rule for this label from a phrase string. Creates a new TuningRules.Rule for this label, automatically determining the correct type of rule (i.e., Substring or Regex) from the provided phrase. Callers must pass the returned rule to Task.addRules(TuningRules.Rule...) before the rule will take effect.
        Parameters:
        phrase - The prase for the new rule. Phrases wrapped in backslash (/, ASCII 2F) characters will be interpreted as regular expressions, like regex literals in JavaScript and Perl.
        weight - The weight for the new rule. Valid weights are between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive. See TuningRules for the interpretation of weight values.
        Returns:
        A rule that can be added to this label's Task.

      • createRule

        public TuningRules.Rule.Regex createRule(Pattern phrase,
